description: Many who returned before the island closed its borders have been unable to retrieve belongings.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man students offered help to retrieve belongings from UK
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man students offered help to retrieve belongings from UK - BBC News
maintext: However, he said he would have to limit his training when it did restart as he had to leave his kit behind and would not be allowed to borrow any under the proposed restrictions.
